name: polyscript
description: PyScript single core to rule them all

scripts.build: npm run rollup:xworker && npm run rollup:core && npm run rollup:pyscript && eslint esm/ && npm run ts && npm run cjs
scripts.test: c8 --100 node --experimental-loader @node-loader/import-maps test/index.js && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:html: npm run test && c8 report -r html
scripts.test:integration//: Don't bother with spinning servers. Trap the tests EXIT_CODE. Kill the running server, if any. Return the EXIT_CODE to eventually throw an error.
scripts.test:integration: static-handler --cors --coep --coop --corp . 2>/dev/null & SH_PID=$!; EXIT_CODE=0; playwright test --fully-parallel test/ || EXIT_CODE=$?; kill $SH_PID 2>/dev/null; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.size: npm run size:module && npm run size:worker
scripts.size:module: echo module is $(cat core.js | brotli | wc -c) bytes once compressed
scripts.size:worker: echo worker is $(cat esm/worker/xworker.js | brotli | wc -c) bytes once compressed

author: Anaconda Inc.
